name: DRAWBACK (Grasp Games Ayush Dutta™)
description:
Play this game. Made by Ayush Dutta, in 2 hours of work. Play and balance the love and hate level and destroy the robo boss. The Easter Egg or the Secret is in the keyboard which can be found during the gameplay.

GAME

You are Zou and are captured in a emotion distorter campus, and are shot with love level and death level or hate level by a EMOTION DISTORTER ROBO which is keeping on firing one you. The ❌ Cross pack kills your score by 1 and increases the death level. The ♥️ Love pack increases the love level by 1. You have to maintain the level of your emotions to medium level. And, shoot the robo and destroy it to be Free from that emotions controling campus. 

*Easter Egg:- There is a secret powerup in the keyboard which you can find out while playing game.

HOW TO PLAY

  • UP KEY TO JUMP
  • SPACE TO SHOOT
  • BALANCE THE EMOTION BAR.

HOPE YOU ENJOY IT.

Included both the themes Love, Death, & Robots and The Price of Freedom, in the sense of escaping from the Emotion Distorter Room.
